title: Trump Says Iran War Could Last Weeks and Gives Competing Visions of New Regime
summary_full: In a brief interview, he said the country’s hardened military should simply surrender their weapons to the Iranian public.
summary_public: In a brief interview, he said the country’s hardened military should simply surrender their weapons to the Iranian public.

IR.label: negative
